metadata.dc:description: Report of two cases of eosinophilic gastroenteritis. In both cases the presentation was an acute abdomen syndrome. The etiological diagnosis was postoperative, because in the preoperative period there were no data characteristic of this entity. Probably this disease is more frequent than reported and although the treatment is medical, there are some cases in which surgery is justified.
metadata.dc:title: Abdomen agudo por gastroenteritis eosinofílica. Estudio de dos casos.
[Acute abdomen due to eosinophilic gastroenteritis. A study of 2 cases].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
